I am a gradute from The Maharaja Sayajirao University, Baroda. Also, an honored receiver of Student of The Year Award(2018 - 2019) for Department of Computer Science and Engineering.

I am interested in Image Processing, Computer Vision and Robotics. I am pursuing the same subjects at University of Massachusetts in Research MS. I have worked with Computer Graphics by making fun little games. That was the conception stage for my interest in Image Processing and Computer Vision. I aspire to be a research scientist in these fields.
